website_summaries.verdict: High-end model with features that warrant price: ID-theft blocking, zipper compartment, and quality top stitching. Ideal for travelers who want a high level of organization.
pros: Plenty of slots and spaces for tickets, receipts, coins, and even a checkbook
Snaps are well made so opening and closing is simple
Holds up to heavy wear due to quality leather
cons: Some reports of layers separating and inconsistent chain and stitching quality
Folded edge looks worn after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a high quality wallet. The wallet is already separating from two different sides. I have other similar wallets that I have had for years and have not done this. It started falling apart within the first week. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Seems very functional and quality appears good
customer_reviews.text: Got wallet was packaged good on initial inspection stitching was good. Outside texture seems good, not as thick as my previous wallet, but that is fine this way it will contour to my body. There are plenty of card slots and this reduced the bulge as all cards are separated. I replaced the chain as it is not sturdy but I anticipated this. I purchased the wallet for its functionality. I am am biker so I purchased the wallet so I can lower its profile and not feel the bulge when riding. I will update my post in the future after I have risen with it for a few thousand miles to let you know how it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Slots galore
customer_reviews.text: I have had tri-fold wallets before but the main problem I've had with them is the only place for Credit Cards was just in the middle of the wallet and it made that section thicker than the other sides consequently more rigid than the rest. This wallet has more than double the number of slots for cards and are located on two sections of the wallet which makes it much flatter and flexible. Enjoying it immensely!
customer_reviews.author: photojock

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; looks authentic and worn-in.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be made of good quality materials; the chain is actually quite heavy and thick. Leatherwork is good and feels / looks authentic. It fits better in my hip pocket than I would have thought. It's about the size of my iPhone 7 Plus, maybe a shade bigger about about twice as thick. I have every card slot filled, by the way. I don't use the chain, but kept the keyring on for looks anyway. A good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Definitely not worth the price. Ordered one, middle was coming apart at seems, got a replacement and the two outer areas are coming apart at the seems. Other than that, not a great desgin, thin and flimsy feeling. Chains connected with a cheap keyring. To top it off, the same exact wallet is at Walmart for 19.99..... major rip off here do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: william hadley

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this wallet so bad
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this wallet because he carries several corporate cards that he uses multiple times throughout the day. This wallet provided very easy access to all the different cards he would need. He had the wallet 9 days when the trim that held the pieces of leather together started to fall off. As for the accessibility, it was great. He was able to hold all of the corporate cards he needed in addition to his personal, license, insurance, etc...It just doesn't seem that it would hold up well long term.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Seems like it should hold up, only time will tell. I am not a heavy wallet user, so I won't be putting this thing under any wear and tear soon. Has pleanty of slots for cards. Has three slots for bills or what not. And even a zippered coin pocket/trinket pocket. Chain is just long enough but can easily be changed out with a few dollars worth of chain from anywhere. Great so far one week in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: and the chain has a nice sag to it
customer_reviews.text: The only problem that I had with this wallet was that the belt loop clasp didn't have and spring to it. This is because of the coating that was put on the chain. If you work the clasp for awhile it will get some spring to it after you work of its coating. The wallet sticks up out of my back pocket and inch or so, and the chain has a nice sag to it. All of the card holders were slightly stiff, but with a little use I am sure that they will slip in and out with ease. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TAS.Co

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this wallet for six months now and the eyelet is ripping out. Very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Patton

customer_reviews.title: Wallet Is  Pricy And Has Stress Points That Fail But Overall It's Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The fabric behind the zippered pouch ripped soon after purchase and the bottom TTK spring loaded snap fell off as well. Aside from that it has held up for a year and a half of motorcycling. I do like it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Altfather Good

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wallet for my needs, very well sewn, excellent design and execution.
customer_reviews.text: Many folks as I suffer from having a lot of plastic this product is great. It offers protection from Skimming (radio connection to Chipped cards. It is very well made, excellent design, and TOUGH.
customer_reviews.author: Gandolf

customer_reviews.title: nice wallet.. chain sucks
customer_reviews.text: nice big wallet with a lot of slots for cards.. on the other hand.. the clasp on the chain broke in less than 3 months.. I'd complain to the manufacturer but as usual Amazon has made it difficult to send feedback after the 'warranty' window has closed..
customer_reviews.author: JCBlues

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have carried a wallet like this for years but was not able to find one recently. This wallet had more room for cards that I expected and the fit and finish was excellent. I am a biker and travel all over the U.S.A. and needed something that could stand up to a great deal of rain as well as temperatures over 100 degrees which we encounter frequently. I can't say for sure as it was just purchased but looks like it will do well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is quite heavy duty. Seems well made. Two heavy snaps to keep it closed. Chain has a tasteful appearance and is easy to use. I bought it because of the number of card slots and the fact it said RFID protected. I would recommend it to anyone that wants complete protection from wear, scanners, and accidential or intentional loss. Solid investment so far.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, heavy duty chain and clasp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet, 17 slots for cards, a zippered coin pocket and 3 pockets for cash, not like I have enough to fill even one:) The chain and clasp are great too. I was using RFID sleeves for my cards, a real pain in the butt, but this whole wallet is RFID blocking!
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets to organize ones life.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wallet I am very impressed with its functionality and it’s vintage look. I was looking for a wallet to organizer all my cards
customer_reviews.author: Charles Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wallet was torn and falling apart upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Received the wallet. It was torn on the inside and the stitching was coming out on the card slots. Cannot use. Had to return. Expected better from a $40 wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Roomy with lots of card pockets
customer_reviews.text: The leather is very stiff, though this may change with use. The chain is too short for my use, I can live with that, and it has plenty of pockets and room for what I need. It appears to be well made from quality material.
customer_reviews.author: venturerider

customer_reviews.title: SHOP CAREFULLY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Photos online make one think the wallet is larger than what it actually is. Barely fits the minimum that I require. Quality is good but . . . . . Next time I require a new wallet I will spend the big money and have one custom made to my requirements at a saddle maker!
customer_reviews.author: Spaceman

customer_reviews.title: Quality decline
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these wallets last year and loved it but this year the quality declined significantly... The leather is thinner and the chain feels much cheaper. The hook on the chain is difficult to hook to a belt loop and the chain itself feels like plastic where it used to feel like metal. Blame on trump or the aaaaaalochol either way i wont buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sivart.ebar

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet. Does what it’s supposed to. No durability rating as I just put it into service
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: IN SIDE SLOTS AND CHANGE POCKET TEARS
customer_reviews.text: THE WALLET WAS GREAT AND THOUGHT WAS MADE GOOD UNTIL A WEEK USING THE WALLET THE CARD SLOTS COMING APART AND THE POUCH THAT HOLDS CHANGE STARTED TO COME APART. I WOULD LIKE TO GET ANOTHER ONE BUT THE BUSINESS THAT SELLS THE WALLET DOESN'T OFFER AN EXCHANGE OR EVEN A RETURN. MY OPINION THE WALLET IS AWESOME FOR HAVE EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO HOLD A MANS VALUABLES BUT IT DOESN'T LAST LONG ON HOLDING THINGS SECURELY.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Petronie

customer_reviews.title: Your credit card is protected in this fine peace of work and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: I like this crazy Horse Brown Trifold Wallet it’s even comfortable to wear I feel better knowing that my money and my cards are protected I really like it thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet. Just not worth what they charge for it
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good. But then the eyelet let loose on the chain to the wallet. So for the money I paid for it. Not worth it. It was a gift. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Received the walet in time, but after a month the sewing thread are coming out and have to cut them over and over in fear that the wallet my come apart soon. It’s a pretty looking wallet but it looks super old now. If I buy again I will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Truth as you see fit

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars when I first reviewed it, but after owning it for a just a few weeks the beading around the edges is all coming loose and falling off. I'll be tossing it in the garbage and looking for another with higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: eric358

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boss as an early Christmas present and I was very satisfied because my boss really liked it. His last wallet had slots for cards but they didn't sew the bottoms of them so they all got lost in the interior of it. He's really diggin' this one though. He also likes just how many card slots were in it too because he's got a lot of cards. Places to stick money and stuff were also pretty spacious too.
customer_reviews.author: Selene Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Is it Right or Is it Left
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice that the chain was set for individuals who use their wallet in right side? I use my wallet on Left and chain isn’t set up ambidextrously. Great material but chain doesn’t exactly match up with wallet quality wise. None the less is a very nice wallet, so I kept it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great workmanship very happy with my wallet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely happy with this wallet! Very well made exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet . Came earlier then expected. Time will tell how durable it is.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wallet. I am tough on my gear so I will write an update in a few months to see if it will hold up to my standards. As on now it seems like what I expected.o
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Cook

customer_reviews.title: Separating on the stitching after light use.
customer_reviews.text: Second time I bought it and its separating on the stitching after 1 month. Seems to be built cheaply. The first one lasted 2 years but this one is already trash.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Superb wallet. Holds everything that I need to carry. I like it...a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Lippmann

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should when riding a motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Waited to write review because of a lot of low reviews. This wallet was held up and looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for our anniversary and he loved it! Great quality, really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lindi

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little stiff. I’m sure it will soften up after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this wallet man the tint of the leather is beautiful even my wife liked it I WILL be ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: I freaking looooooove this wallet man the tint of the leather is beautiful even my wife liked it I WILL be ordering another one ASAP! But I really didn’t like the little sis bronze chain it came with so I replace it with my old one that I made out of a dog chain from our local pet store how ever I highly recommend this wallet......OH! and it’s well priced too.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Wallet was as promised, seems like good craftsmanship, a little bulky but I am very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great looking wallet.... holds plenty of cards and a check book with no problem... we’ll made product.....

customer_reviews.title: Just a superior product, couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. I lose my wallets all the time so having the chain helps. Great quality and I love that it is raid blocking as well.

customer_reviews.title: Missed up wallet
customer_reviews.text: Husband lves it. But the snap broke 3 days if that after we got. Then the sewing started to come undone. So now the wallet is falling apart. He wants a knew one, but he got this wallet on Aug 30th. So im going to have to go w something else.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it's my kinda style, and I use it as my business account wallet, big enuf to fit everything

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made and I love the brown leather
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wallet! Very nicely made and I love the brown leather. Very happy with this purchase.

I can't believe that they are only selling it for that cheep. I could see someonr paying $80 for this. Best thing I have ever bought ever ever ever on Amazon ever. Thank u...

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my husband. He liked all the pockets and the quality of it.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Just received wallet today and was very impressed. Well made, plenty of card space and the wallet had lots of nice features. Would have given a 5 star except the chain that comes with it is cheap looking. No sweat I'm ordering a new chain today.

customer_reviews.title: Very well crafted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my boyfriend . It is a Christmas gift!! I showed him 4 different ones and he choose this one. I think it is very well made and should last a long time.

product_meta.title: Bikers RFID safe Cow Leather Crazy Horse Brown Long Checkbook Trifold Chain Wallet for Men Hunter Vantage style (RFID Crazy Horse Brown, JTC 212 LC with Chain)
feature_bullets: NO SURPRISES, NO DISAPPOINTMENTS,handmade by the finest craftsmanship
RFID safe Signal Blocking Top quality Top Grain Cowhide leather
2 side slips ,20 inch Long Bronze Stainless Chain including Key Ring & Claw Hook- wallet in Heavy Thread with Quality Stitching
16 Credit card slots,ID window,Zippered coin pockets, large Bill compartment Holds upto 20 bills,Roomy enough for fitting of checkbook, Zipper Pocket for Coins, Keys etc.., keep them well organized
